items.title: Geojit Financial board to finalise key details of Rs 200 crore rights issue on September 19
items.description: Geojit Financial's Rights Issue Committee will meet later this week to finalize crucial details of its Rs 200 crore rights issue, including the issue price and entitlement ratio.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a flat to positive start; US markets mixed, Asia falls
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates:  The S&P 500 eked out a slight gain in a subdued session while the Nasdaq fell on Monday, weighed down by a drop in technology stocks as investors assessed the likelihood of an upsized rate cut from the U.S. Federal Reserve this week.

items.title: Samvardhana Motherson QIP opens at a floor price of Rs 188.85 per share
items.description: Along with a QIP of equity shares, Samvardhana will also be issuing compulsorily convertible debentures (CCDs), SMIL said.

items.description: While sentiment toward Bajaj Finance, the largest NBFC player, has improved, Indiaâ€™s leading private lender, HDFC Bank, continues to be a less favored option among market participants

items.title: JK Tyre approves merger with Cavendish Industries, stock in focus
items.description: JK Tyre's board has approved the merger with Cavendish Industries, offering 92 JK Tyre shares for every 100 Cavendish shares, aimed at boosting operational synergies and enhancing shareholder value.

items.title: What does a sharp rise in margin trading mean for the market?
items.description: This rapid increase in margin trading reflects the growing participation and leverage in the market, which can add fuel to a rally but also increase risks if the market turns downward

items.title: Agri Picks Report September 17, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, Rainfall across the country on Monday was 4.7 mm, 15% below the normal of 5.6 mm, according to the India Meteorological Department.

items.title: Chart of the Day: Easing fuel prices to lift earnings of airlines
items.description: Aviation turbine fuel prices dropped to the lowest level in a year

items.title: Mutual funds pump in nearly Rs 6,900 crore in IPOs in August
items.description: Mutual funds, which are seeing record inflows coming through SIPs, invested over Rs 6,900 crore in eight IPOs in August, which also saw the largest primary market fundraising since May 2022 with 10 companies raising a total of Rs 17,000 crore

items.title: SPP Polymer shares debut at 7% premium over IPO price on NSE SME
items.description: The SPP Polymers SME IPO received decent investor interest after the issue was subscribed 43.29 times over three days.

items.title: SpiceJet stock falls 3% on profit booking; airline launches Rs 3000 crore QIP
items.description: SpiceJet shares dropped nearly 3 percent after a profit booking spree, following its recent rally driven by a Rs 3,000 crore QIP at a discounted price.

items.title: TVS Motor shares slide despite launching updated Apache RR310
items.description: Notable new features include a bi-directional quick-shifter and cruise control, though these are only available on the higher-end models.

items.title: IGL stock jumps 6% on UBS upgrade; MGL hits 52-week high after target price boost on strong volume forecast
items.description: Shares of IGL surged over 6 percent following UBS's upgrade to 'buy' and target price hike, while MGL stock hit a 52-week high after its target price was raised, both driven by strong volume growth prospects.

items.title: Ola Electric shares jump 5% after BofA, Goldman Sachs initiate coverage with 'buy' rating
items.description: While Goldman has assigned a price target of Rs 160 per share of Ola Electric, BofA has a target price of Rs 145 per share

items.description: The company is in the business of manufacturing and export of porcelain insulators, and this equity in Swiggy has been acquired as a long-term investment, said Modern Insulators.

items.title: Merchant bankers charge much more to manage IPOs of digital firms; here's why
items.description: Merchant bankers attribute the higher fee to the higher efforts needed to market digital companies as most are loss-making.
